message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $18,000 to start the negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider my counteroffer?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob.  While I understand your position, the value of this product is quite high.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
I understand the value of the product, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $15,200 for the product. Can you consider my counteroffer?
